meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Stand</kanji> behind someone and <kanji>embrace</kanji> them. That's how you show them you're <vocabulary>backing</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>supporting</vocabulary> them. Do this to your local politicians.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
